author: SomeOrdinaryGamers
description:
Hello guys and gals, it's me Mutahar again! Microsoft continues in the path to turn Windows into a computer that can be controlled by your voice without using those pesky keyboards and mice. This comes with serious safety issues that are quickly going to be targeted by hackers and is something that I feel not many are truly clamouring for compared to the overwhelming requests for an operating system that is just less bloated than what it is now. Thanks for watching!
Like, Comment and Subscribe for more videos!
title: The New Windows Update Is Actually Dangerous...
